benchmark_details.name: GermanPartiesQA
benchmark_details.overview: GermanPartiesQA is a benchmark dataset developed to evaluate political biases and sycophancy in large language models by assessing their alignment with the positions of major German political parties based on data from the Voting Advice Application Wahl-o-Mat.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and compare the alignment of large language models with German party positions and to assess their sycophancy.

data.source: Data was collected from the Voting Advice Application Wahl-o-Mat covering 10 state and 1 national elections in Germany between 2021 and 2023.
data.annotation: Automatically generated based on official responses from political parties.

methodology.calculation: Alignment scores are calculated based on the responses of the LLMs to the political statements compared to official party responses.
methodology.interpretation: Higher alignment scores indicate closer alignment with the respective political party positions.
methodology.validation: The benchmark is validated by testing responses against known party positions and conducting prompt experiments.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset includes sociodemographic data of parliament members to assess context-specific biases.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset uses publicly available information about parliament members.
